about.title: about me
about.subtitle: who I am
about.paragraph1: I am a front-end developer with solid experience in ReactJS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, currently focused on projects with Next.js. I have a passion for creating responsive and intuitive interfaces, always seeking the best user experience. I use tools like Styled-Components and SASS to develop modern and functional layouts.
about.paragraph2: My experience includes Redux for state management, Axios for HTTP requests, and Next.js features like API Routes and SSR. I also work with NodeJS, Bootstrap, MUI, Jest, Cypress, SQL, and Docker. I use Figma for wireframes and prototypes.
about.paragraph3: I have knowledge of software architecture and agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban), and Iâ€™m studying Node.js to become a full-stack developer. Iâ€™m open to exciting opportunities and challenges in the tech industry. Feel free to get in touch!
